action.title: Action
action.description: Select whether to map the league directory or scrape specific teams.

group.title: Alphabetical Group
group.description: The A-Z letter to scrape. Leave empty to scrape all leagues.

league_id.title: League ID
league_id.description: Required for 'get-teams' if you only want to scrape teams in a specific league, leave empty to scrape across all leagues

force_refresh.title: Force Refresh
force_refresh.description: Data is cached for 7 days, enable to get a fresh data.
